Registra un nuevo dispositivo para envío de mensajes

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["name","phone"],"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","example":"Mi Dispositivo","description":"Nombre identificador del dispositivo"},"phone":{"type":"string","example":"51987654321","description":"Número de teléfono en formato internacional sin el +"}},"title":"DeviceInput"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Dispositivo creado exitosamente","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"},"phone":{"type":"string"},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["active","inactive","disconnected"]},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}},"title":"Device"}}}},"422":{"description":"Error de validación"}}}
>
